articles.title: State of Origin Game II live: NSW vs Queensland at ANZ Stadium - NEWS.com.au
articles.description: The 2020 State of Origin series is heading to a decider after NSW equalled its fourth-biggest win courtesy of a 34-10 thrashing of Queensland at ANZ Stadium.
articles.content:
Just before the break, Josh Addo-Carr has put the Blues in the box seat with a third try.
